game.name: Pumpkin Jack
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Pumpkin Jack is a Spooky Scary 3D platformer in which you embody Jack, the Mythical Pumpkin Lord! Dive into an Epic Adventure through otherworldly landscapes and help the Evil annihilate the Good!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pumpkin Jack is a Spooky Scary 3D platformer in which you embody Jack, the Mythical Pumpkin Lord! Dive into an Epic Adventure through otherworldly landscapes and help the Evil annihilate the Good!

reviewHighlights.text: A lovely little gem to enjoy around Halloween. Really fun and it made me laugh quite often!
This gameâ€™s beautiful, scary, funny and has a great Halloween vibe. 100 pumpkins of out 10
